prompt: Design a dark-themed user role management interface with a sleek, minimalist aesthetic. The top app bar should display 'User Role Management' in white text on a dark gray background, with a gear icon for settings. Include a search bar below with a subtle gray border, a search icon, and placeholder text 'Search users'. The main content should feature a scrollable grid of user cards (2 columns), each with a circular avatar, user name in bold white text, email in lighter gray, and role badges ('Admin' in red, 'Editor' in blue, 'Viewer' in green). Place an 'Edit Role' button with a dark blue color at the bottom of each card. Use a dark background with slight card elevation for depth and consistent spacing.
